name: Rescue Me - The Lost World
description:
Widely acclaimed Rescue Me is back to bring you to another breathtaking adventure! The mythical Lost World is threatened by earthquakes - the mighty dragon sleeping below it has gotten sick, and it’s sneezes and tumbles are shaking everything on it’s back. You have to cure him - but you need get through many levels of dangers and challenges first!

HIGHLIGHTS
- Casual, innovative action - a running game with drag-and-drop controls!
- Beautiful, detailed, cute cartoonish graphics!
- Various traps - from hidden spears to swinging logs and kamikaze dinos!
- Collect coins - and purchase cool powerups! Slow down time or become invulnerable!
- Share your success - Rescue Me - The Lost World is integrated to Facebook! Challenge your friends and share your achievements with them!

CASUAL CONTROLS
The controls are very easy to learn - just grab your hero with your finger to lift him to the air and swing him around to avoid obstacles. Tap the screen with a second finger to bring up the powerup menu, where you can find some nice surprises which will make your life easier.

AN AMAZING WORLD
Whether you are flying through steaming jungles or racing forward on the dragon’s back, the beautiful - and dangerous - Lost World will never cease to amaze you! Exploring the various traps and challenges - windmills, spears, pterosaurs and crazy mazes - will take hours!

LOTS AND LOTS OF UNLOCKABLES
Collect coins and spend them in the shop to unlock many new skins and upgrades! You’d like to play as a tough survivalist? A funny zombie? A mysterious ninja? Be our guest!

JOIN THE RACE
Log in to Facebook and watch the map turning into one huge leaderboard. Compete with your friends from level to level - grab more coins and collectibles to become the ace. Miss someone from the list? Everyone is just a single invite away!

For more information please visit our website: www.pocketscientists.com
Join our fan club on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PocketScientists?fref=ts
For support or inquiries please contact us here: info@pocketscientists.com
Thank you for playing Rescue Me - The Lost World!
